PR Question.description: Asking a question that needs to be resolved before approval. Only resolved by the reviewer.

PR Suggestion.description: Making a suggestion. No action expected before merging. Can be resolved by the PR author.

PR Request.description: Similar to a question, but the reviewer is expected to take action. Only resolved by the reviewer.

body: > I do not expect this thread to be resolved before merging with approval.
PR Non-blocking Comment.description: Typically used for education or out-ofs-cope discussion. No action expected before merging. Can be resolved by the PR author.

PR Celebration.description: Celebrating a job well done. No action expected before merging. Can be resolved by the PR author.
